verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H5810>prevailed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> them the <S%H4492>dens<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H4631>caves,<s%> and <S%H4679>strong<s%> <S%H4679>holds.<s%>

And so it was, <S%H518>when<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H2232>sown,<s%> that the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up, and the <S%H6003>Amalekites,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east,<s%> even they <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> them;

And they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> the <S%H2981>increase<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4241>sustenance<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> neither <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> nor <S%H7794>ox,<s%> nor <S%H2543>ass.<s%>

For they <S%H5927>came<s%> up with their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> as <S%H697>grasshoppers<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude;<s%> for both they and their <S%H1581>camels<s%> were <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number:<s%> and they <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H1809>impoverished<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H182><s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites,<s%>

That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage;<s%>

And I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> you, and <S%H1644>drove<s%> them out from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> you their <S%H776>land;<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> to you, I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> not the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> you <S%H3427>dwell:<s%> but you have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

And there <S%H935>came<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> an <S%H424>oak<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%> that pertained to <S%H3101>Joash<s%> the <S%H33>Abiezrite:<s%> and his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H2251>threshed<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%> by the wine <S%H1660>press,<s%> to <S%H5127>hide<s%> it from the <S%H4080>Midianites.<s%>
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is with you, you <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H994>Oh<s%> my <S%H113>Lord,<s%> if the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be with us, <S%H4100>why<s%> then is <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4672>befallen<s%> us? and <S%H346>where<s%> be <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6381>miracles<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> us of, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Did not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5927>bring<s%> us up from <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%> but <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> us, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> us into the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> on him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> your <S%H3581>might,<s%> and you shall <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites:<s%> have not I <S%H7971>sent<s%> you?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H994>Oh<s%> my <S%H136>Lord,<s%> with <S%H4100>which<s%> shall I <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H504>family<s%> is <S%H1800>poor<s%> in <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and I am the <S%H6810>least<s%> in my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3588>Surely<s%> I will be with you, and you shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> then <S%H6213>show<s%> me a <S%H226>sign<s%> that you <S%H1696>talk<s%> with me.

<S%H4185>Depart<s%> not <S%H2088>hence,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> to you, and <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H4503>present,<s%> and <S%H3240>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> you. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3427>tarry<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in, and <S%H6213>made<s%> ready a <S%H1423>kid,<s%> <S%H5795><s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>cakes<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H7058>flour:<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> in a <S%H5536>basket,<s%> and he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4839>broth<s%> in a <S%H6517>pot,<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> it out to him <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H424>oak,<s%> and <S%H5066>presented<s%> it.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>cakes,<s%> and <S%H3240>lay<s%> them on <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and <S%H8210>pour<s%> out the <S%H4839>broth.<s%> And he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4938>staff<s%> that was in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>cakes;<s%> and there <S%H5927>rose<s%> up <S%H784>fire<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>cakes.<s%> Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> out of his <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

And when <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H7200>perceived<s%> that he was an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H136>LORD,<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Alas,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3069>God!<s%> for <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be to you; <S%H3372>fear<s%> not: you shall not <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H3073>Jehovahshalom:<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> it is <S%H5750>yet<s%> in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%> of the <S%H33>Abiezrites.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3947>Take<s%> your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6499>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> even the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> old, and <S%H2040>throw<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> that your <S%H1>father<s%> has, and <S%H3772>cut<s%> down the <S%H842>grove<s%> that is by it:

And <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4581>rock,<s%> in the <S%H4634>ordered<s%> <S%H4634>place,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H5927>offer<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifice with the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H842>grove<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3772>cut<s%> down.

Then <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%> to him: and so it was, <S%H834>because<s%> he <S%H3372>feared<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>household,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that he could not <S%H6213>do<s%> it by <S%H3119>day,<s%> that he <S%H6213>did<s%> it by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And when the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> was <S%H5422>cast<s%> <S%H5422>down,<s%> and the <S%H842>grove<s%> was <S%H3772>cut<s%> down that was by it, and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> was <S%H5927>offered<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was <S%H1129>built.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing?<s%> And when they <S%H1875>inquired<s%> and <S%H1245>asked,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

Then the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> <S%H3318>Bring<s%> out your <S%H1121>son,<s%> that he may <S%H4191>die:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H5422>cast<s%> down the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H3772>cut<s%> down the <S%H842>grove<s%> that was by it.

And <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, Will you <S%H7378>plead<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal?<s%> will you <S%H3467>save<s%> him? he that will <S%H7378>plead<s%> for him, let him be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H5704>whilst<s%> it is yet <S%H1242>morning:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he be a <S%H430>god,<s%> let him <S%H7378>plead<s%> for himself, <S%H3588>because<s%> one has <S%H5422>cast<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> his <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Therefore on that <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> him <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let <S%H1168>Baal<s%> <S%H7378>plead<s%> against him, <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H5422>thrown<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> his <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> and the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

But the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3847>came<s%> on <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> and he <S%H8628>blew<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet;<s%> and <S%H44>Abiezer<s%> was <S%H2199>gathered<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> who <S%H1571>also<s%> was <S%H2199>gathered<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him: and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H836>Asher,<s%> and to <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> and to <S%H5321>Naphtali;<s%> and they <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them.
And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said,<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H3322>put<s%> a <S%H1492>fleece<s%> of <S%H6785>wool<s%> in the <S%H1637>floor;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H2919>dew<s%> be <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H1492>fleece<s%> <S%H905>only,<s%> and it be <S%H2721>dry<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> beside, then shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And it was <S%H3651>so:<s%> for he <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow,<s%> and <S%H2115>thrust<s%> the <S%H1492>fleece<s%> together, and <S%H4680>wringed<s%> the <S%H2919>dew<s%> out of the <S%H1492>fleece,<s%> a <S%H5602>bowl<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> Let not your <S%H639>anger<s%> be <S%H2734>hot<s%> against me, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> but this <S%H6471>once:<s%> let me <S%H5254>prove,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, but this <S%H6471>once<s%> with the <S%H1492>fleece;<s%> let it <S%H4994>now<s%> be <S%H2721>dry<s%> <S%H905>only<s%> on the <S%H1492>fleece,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>ground<s%> let there be <S%H2919>dew.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> that <S%H3915>night:<s%> for it was <S%H2721>dry<s%> on the <S%H1492>fleece<s%> <S%H905>only,<s%> and there was <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
